name: Offerings to the Night: Pyre Plains (I)
achievementGroupName: Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)

stage1.title: Offerings to the Night: Pyre Plains (I)
stage1.description: Unlock all the seals on the secret spaces of the tribes in the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.
